job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pstrongJob DescriptionstrongppLooking for opportunities to use cutting edge technologies analyzing petabytes of data in a world class Hadoop cluster Interested in generating analytical insights that inform provider networks and engagement strategies that support members on their individualized health and wellness journey CVSAetnas Analytics and Behavior Change Team delivers strategically impactful programs and tools that expand convenient access to highquality and affordable care for all members across multiple channels across all stages of lifeppbrppThis is a unique opportunity to work on new transformation initiatives with CVS Health as a result of the recent company mergerppbrppAs a machine learning engineer you willppbrpp Work closely with data scientists software developers and product managers to take MLpowered services from inception to productionpp Lead exploration design and execution of machine learning models and frameworks that deliver value to our userspp Build data pipelines and leverage highquality datasets to power your Machine learning modelspp Utilize modern software and dataengineering stacks to enable training deployment and lifecycle management of ML modelspp Lead the performance and ongoing enhancements of your productsppstrongRequired Qualificationsstrongpp2 or more years of progressively complex related experienceppstrongPreferred Qualificationsstrongpp 1 yrs experience as part of a data science machine learning or other software development teampp Proficiency in Pythonpp Experience with machine learning frameworks amp toolkitspp Experience building and productionizing applied machine learning productspp Experience with modern softwareengineering practicespp Experience with big data preferably using Spark Hadoop and Hivepp Familiarity with DockerKubernetes and cloud technologies is a pluspp Excellent problem solving skills critical thinking and conceptual thinking abilitiespp Great communication and crossteam collaboration skillppstrongEducationstrongppMasters degree or PhD preferredppBachelors degree or equivalent work experience in Computer Science Engineering Machine Learning or related disciplineppstrongBusiness OverviewstrongppAt CVS Health we are joined in a common purpose helping people on their path to better health We are working to transform health care through innovations that make quality care more accessible easier to use less expensive and patientfocused Working together and organizing around the individual we are pioneering a new approach to total health that puts people at the heartppbrppWe strive to promote and sustain a culture of diversity inclusion and belonging every day CVS Health is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer We do not discriminate in recruiting hiring or promotion based on race ethnicity sexgender sexual orientation gender identity or expression age disability or protected veteran status or on any other basis or characteristic prohibited by applicable federal state or local law We proudly support and encourage people with military experience active veterans reservists and National Guard as well as military spouses to apply for CVS Health job opportunitiesp
